comments.name: remarks
comments.value: Moves an item from one slot to another container, or to the first available slot in the same container.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Zero-based index of the slot to transfer an item from, on this container.

comments.name: param
comments.value: Target container to transfer to. Note this can be the same container as the source.

comments.name: returns
comments.value:
An itemStack with the items that couldn't be transferred.
Returns undefined if all items were transferred.

comments.name: throws
comments.value: Throws if either this container or `toContainer` are invalid or if the `fromSlot` or `toSlot` indices out of bounds.
